ABOUT

Naoto Yoshimoto is a frontend web developer and designer moved to NYC from JAPAN.
I was a student at the School For Poetic Computation.
I started my career as a freelance, when I was a university student in 2010.Now I'm looking for a new job in NYC.This site is created with knowledge on the internet, greatest open source projects and me. All code available on github.com.I'm on Facebook, Instagram and you can Email me.
